name: MapRegex
description:
This pack contains a transformer that will take in a value and transform it based on multiple regular expressions defined in a JSON dictionary. The key:value pair of the JSON dictionary should be:

"desired outcome": "regex to match"

For example:

{
    "Match 1": ".*match 1.*",
    "Match 2": ".*match 2.*",
    "Catch all": ".*"
}

The transformer will match in order of dictionary entries.
author: Adam Burt
